smells.name: TooManyFunctions
smells.description: Too many functions inside a/an file/class/object/interface always indicate a violation of the single responsibility principle. Maybe the file/class/object/interface wants to manage to many things at once. Extract functionality which clearly belongs together.

instances.message: Class 'AppCompatPreferenceActivity' with '14' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Object 'ReadConfig' with '20' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Object 'Companion' with '11' functions detected. Defined threshold inside objects is set to '11'
Class 'LanbahnPanelActivity' with '27' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'
Class 'Loco' with '18' functions detected. Defined threshold inside classes is set to '11'

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

The function parsePanelElements is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function calcAutoScale is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function openEditDialog is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function roundCorners is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

smells.name: FunctionParameterNaming

smells.name: WildcardImport

Parentheses in (adr == address) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: adr == address
Parentheses in ( data != 0 ) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: data != 0
Parentheses in (state and 0x01) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: state and 0x01
Parentheses in ((state and 0x01) != 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (state and 0x01) != 0
Parentheses in (train != INVALID_INT) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: train != INVALID_INT
Parentheses in ( !prefs.getBoolean(KEY_DRAW_ADR2, false)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: !prefs.getBoolean(KEY_DRAW_ADR2, false)
Parentheses in (selectedLoco == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: selectedLoco == null
Parentheses in (prefs.getBoolean(KEY_ENABLE_LOCO_CONTROL, false)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: prefs.getBoolean(KEY_ENABLE_LOCO_CONTROL, false)
Parentheses in (it.isExpired() == true) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: it.isExpired() == true
Parentheses in (prefs.getString(KEY_SCALE_PREF, "auto") == "manual") are unnecessary and can be replaced with: prefs.getString(KEY_SCALE_PREF, "auto") == "manual"
Parentheses in (es is RouteButtonElement) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: es is RouteButtonElement
Parentheses in (DEBUG) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: DEBUG
Parentheses in (System.currentTimeMillis() - time0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: System.currentTimeMillis() - time0
Parentheses in (prefs.getBoolean(KEY_ENABLE_LOCO_CONTROL, false)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: prefs.getBoolean(KEY_ENABLE_LOCO_CONTROL, false)
Parentheses in (client!!.isConnected()) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: client!!.isConnected()

Parentheses in (grantResults.isNotEmpty() && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: grantResults.isNotEmpty() && grantResults[0] == PackageManager.PERMISSION_GRANTED
Parentheses in (cfFilename != configFilename) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: cfFilename != configFilename
Parentheses in (panelElements.size == 0) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: panelElements.size == 0
Parentheses in (shutdownFlag == false) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: shutdownFlag == false
Parentheses in (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastReceived) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: System.currentTimeMillis() - lastReceived
Parentheses in (socket == null) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: socket == null
Parentheses in (connectionActive == false) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: connectionActive == false
Parentheses in ((a >= 0) and (a <= LBMAX)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (a >= 0) and (a <= LBMAX)
Parentheses in (decrFlag or incrFlag) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: decrFlag or incrFlag

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.
